channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024050076
item.description:
Report X-2024050076

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-06T15:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-19
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. Inner contents: 4 metal cans, 2 tops came off of 2 cans. There were no clips, or rings on the cans. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.
